pages.text: You can fish in rivers, lakes, and the ocean for all sorts of fish! A vanilla fishing rod will give you vanilla and harvestcraft aquatic life, while Just a Few Fish's rods will give you guaranteed vanilla fish, but with a twist!

pages.title: New Rod Mechanics
pages.text: This special fishing rod is interesting. First, you have to load it with bait by crafting it with any kind of seed in any amount.$(br) Next, use it like a normal fishing rod and cast the line.$(br) Then, wait until a fish hooks onto it. Only fish that actually spawn as entities will bite on.$(br) Finally, reel in the fish! Don't spam-click, or else it'll break.
One of the types of fish that spawns in the water. You can also "fish" by attacking them in the water!

pages.title: Catching Fish
pages.text: If you have an empty bucket when you reel in a fish, you will catch it in your bucket. To let it go, simply right-click the bucket into the world to release the fish along with the bucket's contents. $(br2)Captured fish can be placed in a fish farm.

pages.title: Fish Farming
pages.text: That's right, there's a fish farm, where you can breed your fish to make more and potentially sell!$(br2) Place down tank blocks in any shape you want (they're a freeform multiblock), and right-click it with a captured fish in a bucket to release it into the farm.
To breed the fish, simply toss some seeds into the farm, the fish will eat it and mate.$(br2) To harvest the fish, simply use a rod or hit them with a weapon.
